Title: Elway: Run game will be Peyton's best friend
Content: Broncos GM John Elway wants the running game to be Peyton Manning's "best friend" in 2015.

Title: Jets learned of Richardson's arrest Thursday
Content: Newsday reports the Jets "had no knowledge" of Sheldon Richardson's July 14 on resisting arrest and traffic charges before Thursday.
